short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows intros and outros to be skipped through a skip button per anime episode on Crunchyroll

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension users can upload a time frame for either intros or outros per anime episode. Once a time frame is uploaded, a skip button will appear when the episode reaches the uploaded time frame. If the user clicks the skip button, the time frame will be skipped.
